resources.string: Simple usage of the homogeneous section showing how you can render a list of models.
Displays a list of items in alphabetical order. Also showcases usage of the empty section decorator.
Displays a list of items that are filtered by a search term.
Displays a list with two sections, and shows how sections can be updated independently. Uses header section decorators to provide headers for the seperate sections.
Showcasing how to apply the empty section decorator.
Showcasing how complex list structures can be achieved by correctly composing section decorators.
Displays a list of items that can be selected, and showcases how the selected items and be retrieved.
Displays different view types in the same section.
Showcases how builtin viewcells can be used to build powerful screens very fast.
